OPENING: ^You took your time. You were supposed to arrive hours ago.
^I'm sorry. The road was blocked. I left the cart at the gate...
EXPLANATION: ^You what?! Where are my supplies? Is the cart still at the gate?
^They were waiting for me. They knocked me out and took everything.
AMBUSHERS: ^What?! Who ambushed you? Did you get a good look at them?
ANGERY: ^Useless! I'll have my men make... inquiries. You can leave.
^I need your help. They stole my pass.

b: ^ The guard at the gate won't let me leave.
^I don't think the guard will let me leave.

ANGERY: ^I can't get you your shipment back. But I can get you a discount on the next one.
HELP_PLS: ^Interesting... That should raise some flags around here.
HELP_PLS_II: ^I can help you get out. But it's going to cost you.
^How about a discount on future shipments?
DISCOUNT: ^A discount? How awfully nice of you. You lost my shipment, but I have a discount next time. We're running out of food. We needed those supplies. Now I'll have to cut rations again. The situation was tense enough already.
DISCOUNT_II: ^I'll take your offer. But you better put that shipment together quickly. And I'm not paying you for the one you botched.
^I'll do what I can. But I need your help getting out.

b: ^ They took my pass and the guard won't let me leave.
^I think they stole my pass, too. Can't get out without it.

DISCOUNT_ALT: ^First, you lose my supplies, now you offer me a discount? We're running out of food here. I'll have to cut rations again. The situation was tense enough already.
DISCOUNT_ALT_II: ^I'll take the discount. But that won't cover the price you have to pay to get out of here.
ARGUMENT: ^Right. Of course. Maybe I should just look for a new... partner. Someone more reliable. Someone who ensures the safety of my investments.
^How many people are even willing to make these deliveries? You need me.
OFFER: ^Maybe. It would certainly take time I don't have. But getting you out of the district will take time too. And it's very expensive. You'll owe me.
PREPARATIONS: ^Good. I'll make the necessary preparations. While you're stuck here you can start paying off your debt. Do some work for me.
DOCTOR_TASK: ^There's a physician. She's set up down by the eastern tunnel. Just follow the purple smoke in the sky. She should be by the house in front of it. You can't miss her. She turned the entire area into a makeshift hospital.
DOCTOR_TASK_II: ^I need you to bring her this satchel of supplies. Don't lose them again or you won't be leaving this district after all. Got it?
DOCTOR_TASK_III: ^Now get going. I have work to do.
